actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the charter of the United States Olympic Committee in order to clarify the provisions thereof relating to resolution of disputes involving national governing bodies.

summary.text: Amends the charter of the United States Olympic Committee to: (1) permit arbitrators to consider prior findings of fact by the Committee when deciding a controversy between the Committee and an amateur sports organization; (2) require a national governing body to resign its membership in any international sports federation immediately after the Committee revokes recognition of such body; and (3) grant automatically to a newly recognized national governing body all of the powers and membership rights to which other such bodies are entitled under the charter.

titles.title: A bill to amend the charter of the United States Olympic Committee in order to clarify the provisions thereof relating to resolution of disputes involving national governing bodies.
